name: 1.) Using the USPD web app, choose a state & county (or counties) to search. Pick a locale that doesn't show up. Stick with District & State Attorneys.
2.) Download this template & upload it to your own Google Drive. Make sure it is private.
3.) Fill in as much information as you can find. If you can't find anything, it's okay if you leave columns blank!

4.) When finished, delete all the empty rows along with these instructions: select rows, right-click, "Delete Rows." Export as a .csv file & save to your forked repository: File > Download > Comma-separated values (.csv)

5.) Follow the rest of the Hacktober2020 instructions to submit your pull request. Your data will be added to the database, & your GitHub profile will be added to the Contributors gallery (if you'd like).
